        program combined
        implicit none

        integer :: N, L, R, QL, QR, i
        integer, allocatable :: W(:)
        integer(8) :: min_val, cand, total_sum

children.text:
Read input for the first program
        read(*,*) N
        read(*,*) L, R, QL, QR
        allocate(W(N)) do i = 1, N
            read(*,*) W(i)
        end do

        ! Compute prefix_sum: from 0 to N (so we need N+1 elements)
        allocate(prefix_sum(N+1))
        prefix_sum(1) = 0
        do i = 1, N
            prefix_sum(i+1) = prefix_sum(i) + W(i)
        end do
        total_sum = prefix_sum(N+1)

        min_val = huge(0_8)   ! a big number

        do lCount = 0, N
            rCount = N - lCount

            ! Calculate base cost: 
            ! The first lCount items go to the left: cost L each -> total cost = (prefix_sum(lCount+1)) * L
            ! The remaining rCount items go to the right: cost R each -> total cost = (total_sum - prefix_sum(lCount+1)) * R
            cand = prefix_sum(lCount+1) * L + (total_sum - prefix_sum(lCount+1)) * R

            ! Penalties for imbalance
            imbalance_left = max(0, lCount - rCount - 1)
            imbalance_right = max(0, rCount - lCount - 1)

            cand = cand + imbalance_left * QL + imbalance_right * QR

            if (cand < min_val) min_val = cand
        end do

        ! Convert min_val to string
        write(str, '(I0)') min_val

        ! Now, check the string for 'A' and 'B'
        if (index(str, 'A') > 0 .and. index(str, 'B')

        program combined
        implicit none

        integer :: N, i, lCount, rCount, imbalance_left, imbalance_right
        integer(8) :: L, R, QL, QR
        integer, allocatable :: W(:)
        integer(8) :: min_val, cand, total_sum
        integer(8), allocatable :: prefix_sum(:)
        character(len=20) :: str

        read(*,*) N
        read(*,*) L, R, QL, QR
        allocate(W(N))
        do i = 1, N
            read(*,*) W(i)
        end do

        allocate(prefix_sum(N+1))
        prefix_sum(1) = 0
        do i = 1, N
            prefix_sum(i+1) = prefix_sum(i) + W(i)   ! W(i) is 32-bit, but added to 64-bit -> 64-bit
        end do
        total_sum = prefix_sum(N+1)

        min_val = huge(0_8)

        do lCount = 0, N
            rCount = N - lCount
            cand = prefix_sum(lCount+1) * L + (total_sum - prefix_sum(lCount+1)) * R

            imbalance_left = max(0, lCount - rCount - 1)
            imbalance_right = max(0, rCount - lCount - 1)

            cand = cand + QL * imbalance_left + QR * imbalance_right

            if (cand < min_val) min_val = cand
        end do

        write(str, '(I0)') min_val

        if (index(str, 'A') > 0 .and. index(str, 'B') > 0) then
            write(*, '(A)') 'Yes'
        else
            write(*, '(A)') 'No'
        end if

        end program combined
